alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 05 at 12:39AM PDT until November 06 at 12:27PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Seattle WA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Snohomish River At Snohomish affecting Snohomish County. .Heavy rain over the Central Cascades, four to six inches Friday, has come to an end early Saturday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snohomish River At Snohomish. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, the Snohomish River will flood several roads...including the Snohomish-Monroe highway...and low areas of the lower Snohomish valley that are not protected by levees. A stage of 27 feet on the Snohomish River corresponds roughly to a Phase 2 in the Snohomish County flood program. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage around 5 am and crest near 27.2 feet around midday. The river will recede below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this morning at 845 AM PDT.
